verses.roman:
ei-mata dui-jana kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge
sukhe kāla goṅāya rūpa haridāsa-saṅge

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; dui-jana—Haridāsa Ṭhākura and Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge—in the pleasure of discussing topics about Kṛṣṇa; sukhe—in happiness; kāla—time; goṅāya—passes; rūpa—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; hari-dāsa-saṅge—in the company of Haridāsa Ṭhākura.
translation: In this way Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī passed his time in close association with Haridāsa Ṭhākura by discussing the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa in great happiness.
